channel.title: Packages on greyR - an older persons adventures in R
channel.description: Recent content in Packages on greyR - an older persons adventures in R

item.title: PHE R packages
item.description: As part of our open data and data science strategy we create R packages, three of which we have made widely available through [CRAN](). The most popular is fingertipsR which reads data from Fingertips via the fingertips API. library(pacman) p_load(cranlogs, tidyverse) cran_plot <- function(packages = "fingertipsR", from = Sys.Date() - 365, to = Sys.Date(), title = "Plot"){ plot <- cranlogs::cran_downloads(packages = packages, to = to, from = from) %>% group_by(month = zoo::as.
